title: Syncing with iCloud calendars.
content: Please tell me how to sync my Thunderbird calendar to pass my appointments to my iPad/iPhone running ios18.1.1. It used to work for iOS 17. I am using the current Thunderbird edition.
creator: 1vabeachboy

title: What will Thunderbird do if folder will be deleted?
content:
What will Thunderbird do if I delete a folder which sorting rule in Thunderbird should move message? I need an answer which actual for Thunderbird versions 40 and higher. Thanks.

I have rule to move messages from Inbox to user created folder. I want to move all messages from this folder and delete empty folder. How will work work? Will stay messages in Inbox? Yes I want to stay messages in Inbox.

Why can I not delete rule? There are case when I have no access to machine with Thunderbird and rule, when I use browser to manage my mailbox.
creator: PavelkoT

title: PRINTING
content:
Since installing thunderbird, following failure of my Outlook email manager I have been unable to print an email attachment using the system dialog option and also unable to print in draft format to save on ink.

Any suggested fix?
creator: kell.19

title: email body missing from emails in folders
content:
I use google to host my email account. I use Imap with TB 128.5.0 esr. MacOS 15.1.1.

Recently, maybe after last OS update, older emails stored in folders (synced with google mail) have zero body text. The same emails are fine on my ipad and phone.

I have check that all folders are subscribed and forced a sync.

Help!

Thank you!
creator: bryan68

title: double payment
content: I am retired and I get a little money from the CPP & Old Age, and I authorize a donation for you $7.90. But you are taking two donations from my account, the other is $ 11.13 which I didn't authorize. Please keep the money you got already and please do not get over payment any more. thank you. Pablo.

title: Thunderbird
content:
I keep getting the following message whenever I bring up Thunderbird…

Error with account xxxxxx@gmail.com The STAT command did not succeed. Error getting message number and sizes. Mail server pop.gmail.com responded: [SYS/PERM] Your account is not enabled for POP access. Please visit your Gmail settings page and enable your account for POP access.

Please help! Thank you!

title: Compact Junk & Trash
content:
Windows 11 Thunderbird 128.5.0esr (64-bit)

I compact JUNK by right click "Empty Junk" / "Compact"

I compact TRASH by right click "Empty Trash"

File "Compact Folders"

This process used to show me how much space I am saving - I do not see this number anymore.
creator: michael.royce

title: Richiesta continua password

title: Only parts of RSS feeds get downloaded
content:
Hi,

on Thunderbird 115.16.3 (32 bit) I have a problem: only approximately the first half of the RSS feeds I've set up get downloaded.

Download always stops at the same feed.

The other don't: I have for each one to right click and choose download.

This happen since last, last by one or last by two updates: I'm not sure. Before it worked perfectly. I've cleaned the startup cache, but the behavior is still the same.

How can I solve the problem?

Thanks
creator: sandman421

title: mail "invisibili"
content: Le mail sono INVISIBILI, nel senso che ci sono ma non si vedono. Come so che ci sono? quelle sul server sono visibili se mi connetto al mio mail aziendale tramite browser, invece che con Thunderbird, mentre le cartelle di Local Folder" su cui ho salvato i file più vecchi ma comunque necessari, è pieno ma non viene aprto da thunderbird. Suppongo sia stato un virus..specifico per questa applicazione o un baco/incompatibilità con gli ultimi aggiornamenti. Quest'ultima opzione mi sembra la più probabile, visto che all'inizio mi bastava spostare un folder di mail per veder riapparire tutto il contenuto...ora no. Si vedono solo i mail nuovi, che spariscono dopo la prima lettura.
creator: monicadesimone3
